title: Enhancing patient care practical competencies: Online program for developing decision-making skills for adolescent soccer athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform optimal decision-making in simulation environments with over 80% accuracy across diverse game situations
Learners can increase proactive decision-making time by over 40% after four weeks through activity-based practical design
Learners can enhance tactical judgment abilities in actual game footage by at least two levels on a three-tier evaluation system through video analysis assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
